quest.name: Fool Me Twice
journal: Glaumunt has finally devised a plan to appropriate a suit of magitek armor.

In excited tones, Glaumunt reveals to you his cunning plan for appropriating a magitek reaper. For the first step, seek out an imperial patrol outside Castrum Centri, and alert them to the presence of enemy forces. Remember to greet your superiors with an /imperialsalute.

You have alerted the imperial patrol to the enemy's presence. As Glaumunt forewarned, however, the soldiers seem hesitant to venture far beyond the sight of the castrum's walls. You will need to lure them out by using the imperial smoke signal at the specified location.

You have succeeded in acquiring a magitek reaper, though some repairs will be required before it can be put to use. Cid bids you meet him back at his workshop in Revenant's Toll. Speak with Slafborn at the front door to be admitted.

You arrive at Cid's workshop to find that Biggs and Wedge have already set about repairing the magitek reaper. When their work is complete, it will finally be time to undertake the most dangerous phase of the mission: the rescue itself.
objectives: Greet the imperial centurion with an /imperialsalute.
Use the imperial smoke signal at the specified location.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: Good work gettin' them imperial duds. You'll be pleased to hear I ain't been idle myself. It took me long enough, but I've finally hatched a plan to get us a suit o' magitek armor.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: Now, from what I've seen, Castrum Centri deploys a reaper for most of its patrols.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: Trouble is, the patrols 'emselves are irregular─meanin' random routes an' random deployments─an' hardly any of 'em come anywhere near Revenant's Toll.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: So, hopin' to coax the imperials out o' their shells, I took the liberty o' feedin' 'em a bit o' the old false intelligence─told 'em insurgents had designs on their stronghold.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: 'Tain't far from the truth, now I come to think of it. Anyroad, we should start seein' more patrols than we have up till now.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: What you need to do is approach one o' these patrols, dressed up in your shiny tin suit, an' alert 'em to the enemy's presence.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: Havin' done that, you'll want to lure 'em as near to Revenant's Toll as you can. Like as not, though, they'll be wary o' venturin' far from their own walls.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: If they do need a bit of extra encouragement, use this smoke signal here, filched fresh from an imperial scout. They'll come runnin' when they see that. An' when the cavalry arrives, you hit 'em hard an' make off with their reaper─simple as that.

dialogue.name: GLAUMUNT
dialogue.text: If I ain't mistaken, there's a patrol sweepin' the perimeter right now, so run along, eh? Oh, an' don't forget to salute!

dialogue.name: NPCA
dialogue.text: My wife bore me a son not long after I was sent here. I can't wait to go home and meet him.

dialogue.name: NPCB
dialogue.text: Did you hear about these insurgents? Apparently, they've got their eye on the castrum. Personally, I'd like to see them try to take it. It'd serve to lift the tedium.

dialogue.name: NPCC
dialogue.text: Get moving, you lot! The quicker we march, the sooner this will be over!

dialogue.name: NPCD
dialogue.text: All the coin I make doing this goes to the wife in the country. If it turns out she's been squandering it on fancy clothes and gewgaws, I will not be amused.

dialogue.name: NPCE
dialogue.text: They say it's our duty to bring civilization to these lands, but what if these lands don't want civilizing?

dialogue.name: NPCF
dialogue.text: From another patrol, are you? When next you see your commanding officer, tell him that he leads a sloppy unit. If any of my lot forgot to salute a superior officer, they would be on their arse faster than you can say “latrine duty.”

dialogue.name: NPCF
dialogue.text: One of our covert operatives, I take it? In or out of uniform, you would do well to remember your courtesies.

dialogue.name: NPCF
dialogue.text:
Carry on, soldier.
...Hm? Insurgents gathering to the east, you say?

dialogue.name: NPCF
dialogue.text:
One of our covert operatives, are you? Carry on, soldier.
...Hm? Insurgents gathering to the east, you say?

dialogue.name: NPCF
dialogue.text: Judging by your description, they are well beyond the perimeter...but I will not have it said that I was remiss. You, return to the scene and keep an eye on those insurgents. Should aught go awry, use your smoke signal to call us.

dialogue.name: NPCF
dialogue.text: Give me strength... If that was your idea of a salute, you can wave good-bye to that promotion right now.

dialogue.name: NPCF
dialogue.text: Return to the scene and keep an eye on those insurgents. Should aught go awry, use your smoke signal to call us.

dialogue.name: NPCA
dialogue.text: One of our informers, I take it? <sigh> Do you have any idea what will happen if you're seen with us? The insurgents will have your head!

dialogue.name: NPCB
dialogue.text: What do you want?

dialogue.name: NPCC
dialogue.text: You have no business being here! Begone or I will take you for an insurgent!

dialogue.name: NPCD
dialogue.text: Need...sleep... <snore>

dialogue.name: NPCE
dialogue.text: Trespassers will be dealt with severely. You have been warned.

dialogue.name: DUMMY
dialogue.text: (Use smoke signal at the specified location)

dialogue.name: DUMMY
dialogue.text: (Lcut)

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: I hope you don't mind my joining. Seeing as we're seizing advanced weaponry, I thought it best to be on hand.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Ah, there she is.

dialogue.name: NPCF
dialogue.text: This is the place...but where is the enemy?

dialogue.name: NPCD
dialogue.text: Sir, over there!

dialogue.name: NPCF
dialogue.text: Send in the reaper! Let us make an example of these insurgents!

dialogue.name: DUMMY
dialogue.text: (QIB)

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: At last, our very own suit of magitek armor!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Hmmm... Not wishing to look a gift chocobo in the beak, it does seem rather the worse for wear, doesn't it?

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Biggs, Wedge─what's your honest assessment?

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: Weeell...there's the fact that she's smoking, of course... But looking past that, I'd say she was structurally sound.

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Hmmm...I don't like the way these legs are buckled. I hate to say this, but the servomechanism may be damaged.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: Eh? But aren't those things protected by ilm-thick armor plate?

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: They are, yes... It's odd─the casing doesn't seem to have taken a blow. I suspect we're dealing with a faulty part.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: Well, whatever it is we're dealing with, we're not resting till it's fixed! Not one wink of sleep─you got that, Wedge?

dialogue.name: WEDGE
dialogue.text: Oh... <mumble> <mumble> ...ing cart chocobo.

dialogue.name: BIGGS
dialogue.text: I heard that!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: A hall has been set aside for our use in Revenant's Toll.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: That's where we'll carry out the repairs. Look for us there, Forename.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: We've now had time to take a closer look at the reaper. Our preliminary diagnosis was correct─she's structurally sound, but her servomechanism is faulty.

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: You needn't worry, though─Biggs and Wedge will see her restored to her former glory in no time at all. Give those two something to mend, and they will think of naught else till the job's done. 'Tis a marvelous thing to behold─provided you remind them to visit the privy.

dialogue.name: SLAFBORN
dialogue.text: ...The magitek armor? Cid and the others took it inside. Go on in and join them.

dialogue.name: EVENTAREA
dialogue.text: Proceed to Cid's workshop?

dialogue.name: EVENTAREA
dialogue.text: Yes

dialogue.name: EVENTAREA
dialogue.text: No

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Defeat the imperial patrol!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Keep hitting the reaper till it stops moving!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Put down all of the foot soldiers, then concentrate on the reaper! A few scratches can't be helped!

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLDIER
dialogue.text: Hostiles detected! Engaging!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: It's not easy being an engineer...

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Damn it! The armor has gone into overdrive! If you value your life, stay out of its sights!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Hah! That did the trick!

dialogue.name: CID
dialogue.text: Ugh... Out of my depth... Bloody...idiot.

obj.n: Every Little Thing She Does Is Magitek
